path_finder_plus.description: A more robust pathfinder that can navigate around on-screen NPCs and correctly handles one-way tiles.

impassable_coordinates.description: A JSON string of a list of [x, y] coordinates to treat as impassable.

route_finder.description: Finds a path between two maps using the World Knowledge Graph.

farfetchd_herder.description: Solves the Ilex Forest Farfetch'd puzzle by finding the Farfetch'd on the map and then calculating the correct sequence of player movements to herd it to a target location. This version actively searches for the Farfetch'd on the map.
